answers.answer: I agree with bbyv. Just make sure to let your OB know at your next visit. If it stays painful go to the hospital and have them check your blood pressure. Pain on the right side could be a sign of preeclampsia.
I was kind of scared of my baby umbilical cord is wrapped around him because I keep forgetting that I'm not supposed to reach over my head but after that that's when my right side startted hurting

If you're worried you should go ahead and get an ultrasound. But the truth is that most babies have the umbilical chord wrapped around either a hand or foot or even their neck. My doctor said its more common than not. She also told me not to worry too much because that chord is crazy long.

question: My right side of my stomach hurts do anyone know what that means? I'm 29 weeks
title: just went for a walk
